title: REEF-LUX 450 MIL-K
paragraphs: The REEF-LUX 450 MIL-K is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the REEF-LUX 450 from the Splatlands Collection and features a different sub and special weapon.

The REEF-LUX 450 MIL-K resembles the REEF-LUX 450, but the central black part becomes white and the strings are orange instead of white. Additionally, there is a small triangular hook on top of the weapon.
The REEF-LUX 450 MIL-K makes its first appearance in Splatoon 3 with identical stats to the REEF-LUX 450.
- Promotional image of the Splatlands Collection - Barazushi weapons

The suffix "MIL-K" is a stylized spelling of the word milk.
